comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This is likely Mrs. James A. Stevenson, and her daughter Helen Stevenson, of Garden City, Long Island, NY. Miss Helen Stevenson married George Collier Decker of Garden City on February 21, 1916. Among the bride's attendants was her sister, Miss Dorothy Stevenson.[1]

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Pixel Wrangler, thanks for the additional information.  Could you tell me where you found this information?  I did not find it in Wikipedia.  Much appreciated, thanks.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Pete (LOC P&P): the reference link (N Y Times) was included at the end of the comment (as "footnote" 1)..
